name: If you fall in this hole, you're not coming out.
name_original: If you fall in this hole, you're not coming out.
description:
[2-4 players & gamepads required]

A game about ritual combat. 4 players are thrown into a pit, and must push each other towards a hole in the centre, where a hungry demon dwells. As players are sacrificed to the demon, rain increases and the flow of water pushes players down the pit. The last surviving player is the winner.

Move with LS & spin with RS to hit other players.
